# heif

**Type Property**

A type that represents High Efficiency Image File Format images.

## Declaration

```swift
static var heif: UTType { get }
```

## Discussion

The identifier for this type is `public.heif`.

This type conforms to a base type identified by `public.heif-standard`, which in turn conforms to [doc://com.apple.uniformtypeidentifiers/documentation/UniformTypeIdentifiers/UTTypeImage].

## Apple image formats

- **heic**: A type that represents High Efficiency Image Coding images.
- **livePhoto**: A type that represents Live Photos.
